website_summaries.verdict: Pair of mirrors that will mount tightly to the snowmobile frame and won’t pop loose under stress.
pros: Having two mirrors in the set allows you to use them in tandem to precisely see what’s located behind you
Mirrors consist of high impact materials, which is helpful for using your snowmobile over rough terrain
Tight connections and joints in the mirrors will ensure they stay in place at all times
cons: May not fit all models of snowmobiles, so check compatibility before you order

customer_reviews.title: Much more than silly rabbit ears!
customer_reviews.text: My biggest concern before ordering this was whether I’d be able to adjust the mirrors to a position that was less offensive to my taste. The manufacturer’s pictures do not do the product justice. Please enjoy the pics as installed on a 2013 Polaris Sportsman 500. They were intentionally pivoted forward in front of the handlebar to achieve greater motion in technical ATV maneuvers. I am very happy with the value for such a low price.
customer_reviews.author: Gwendolyn

customer_reviews.title: Street legal
customer_reviews.text: Brought it to be street legal in Idaho. Does work when you riding with friends. Dont have to turn my head all way around
customer_reviews.author: daniel

customer_reviews.title: Great mirrors
customer_reviews.text: Great mirrors, just be careful with them one of the clamps I tightened to much and it accidentally cracked the steel but there's a screw on both sides so it's still mounted fine and isn't going anywhere. I put them on the front racks of my atv because the handlebars are to filled with the winch and everything else I have. Wouldve been fine with just one of them on the handlebars but I do like the way they look on the front rack of my Can Am
customer_reviews.author: Bailey Miller

customer_reviews.title: I can see behind again
customer_reviews.text: When I bought my new (to me) 4-wheeler I didn't realize that it did not have rear view mirrors. These were $10.00 less expensive than the Polaris brand and do almost as good. It took a bit of maneuvering to get them both on my handlebars but after some moving things around it fit. Since the weather has been cold, colder and freezing I did not get to try them on the road yet but I would imagine that it will be better than not having rear view mirrors.
customer_reviews.author: DRRealEstate

customer_reviews.title: Great, big mirrors
customer_reviews.text: I replaced two mirrors on my recumbent bicycle that were smaller and had less of a rear view surface area. I cannot turn my head backward on my recumbent to see traffic without the bicycle turning as it would cause me to lean as it try to. The mirrors I replaced were plastic and broke on a light tip over when stopped. These would not have broken as they are much more robust. I am sure these would work well on any vehicle.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Installed these on a 2019 polaris sportsman. I didn't have to move anything to install them on the handle bars. The bases fit well in tight places and hold tight. The mirrors are sturdy no noticeable vibration and they are strong enough to withstand brush hitting them. The mirrors provide a nice feild of view behind you while riding.
customer_reviews.author: MG

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice! Excellent Service!
customer_reviews.text: Look and fit great on my Kymco MXU 700 ATV. Didn't come with mirrors. But these complete the package with style and clear. crisp images of what's behind you at any speed. The supplier was great when I pulled a bone head move and broke one of the mirrors trying to adjust it. Totally my fault but the mirrors had a warranty that covered it. That is exceptional service in my book!
customer_reviews.author: Steve K.

customer_reviews.title: If you need mirrors...These are the mirrors to buy!
customer_reviews.text: Installed these yesterday on my 2019 Polaris Sportsman 570. Fit great! Super easy to install! The best part is - I went for a "rough" ride and the mirrors stayed as tight as tight could be, Stayed in position. Very, Very HAPPY with this purchase. GREAT value for your money!
customer_reviews.author: Rick Perry

customer_reviews.title: Pics for this item do not describe it well
customer_reviews.text: I don't like how the mirrors sorta stand up in the pics the seller advertises so I was weary to buy. But after purchasing and being able to install mirrors in a fashion that was more normal to the usual setup, I was very happy.
customer_reviews.author: ed

customer_reviews.title: Mirrors for quad
customer_reviews.text: They come a size too big to fit anything and provide rubber strips to shim the mount which vibrates out quite quickly. Lamenting the days of professional engineering long gone
customer_reviews.author: mg

customer_reviews.title: Looked great but wrong threads
customer_reviews.text: The title summed this up. I got the mirrors and hoped to just screw them into the existing mounts but the threads was wrong so i had lots of work to mount them but I got it done.. Mirrors work great !!!
customer_reviews.author: Clinker

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product and Easy to Install
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived quickly and exactly as described. Perfect for my application and I appreciated the fact that thy came with addtional "wedges" to improve the fit on the handlebars if required. In my case they were not needed. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Chroaz

customer_reviews.title: Love the mirrors - very easy to install.
customer_reviews.text: I have a Baja Warrior mini bike and had purchased a different set of mirrors on here that I did not like so I gave these a try and couldn't be happier. These mirrors were a perfect fit and extremely easy to install. They seem to be of good quality as well.
customer_reviews.author: Rony M.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect mirrors for our Can Am ATV
customer_reviews.text: My husband was looking for mirrors for his atv and these are perfect. They were easy to install and give him the rear view sight that he needed. I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Geraldine Neumann

customer_reviews.title: Missing part
customer_reviews.text: Package Missing neoprene cover The right mirror was compete with the cover that covers the clamp but the cover is missing ( never got it) for the left mirror Please send me one
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent mirrors for the price
customer_reviews.text: Mirrors are ok but be careful not to over tighten screws are cheap metal and will strip.
customer_reviews.author: rw

customer_reviews.title: Easy Install
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for a 2005 Honda Rancher. I was a little worried that I didn't have enough free space on the handlebars to mount them.... turns out that I just had to pull the back clamp off of both brake brackets and replace them with the provided clamp that contains the mounting boss for the mirrors. Perfect fit, seem sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: John Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: These mirrors were very easy to install and are a great value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Install
customer_reviews.text: I put these on an '05 Polaris Sportsman and they were easy to install and now I'm legal to ride on the streets in the small town I reside in.
customer_reviews.author: john clark

customer_reviews.title: Very solid mirrors.
customer_reviews.text: These re very solid and do not vibrate at all. I have them on a minibike (which vibrates some), and I am very happy with these.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Great side mirrors, easy to install.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put on and work great. You have to know what’s coming up behind you.
customer_reviews.author: Sick Nikes

customer_reviews.title: Good for 4 wheeler
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for husbands Honda Rubicon and they fit nicely on the front rack. We liked that the were adjustable to fit anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Ann Boyle

customer_reviews.title: Better.
customer_reviews.text: Great value, actually a better design than factory. They are inside the the handlebars. Keeping brush from hitting them.very nice product.
customer_reviews.author: Tammie

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: Very limited range of movement. Bases are cast. Mine broke when tightening.
customer_reviews.author: Monty A. Meeks

customer_reviews.title: They don’t fit on handlebars on Honda Foreman
customer_reviews.text: They do Not fit in the proper place on Honda Foreman handlebars. They would have t to be mounted to far down the handlebars to be of any use. I mounted them on the front rack bars. So, No they won’t fit in the proper place on Honda Foreman handlebars
customer_reviews.author: fred lynn

customer_reviews.title: used for TV on a polaris sportsman quad
customer_reviews.text: fits great on the right side of polaris 570. able to see clearly
customer_reviews.author: sue

customer_reviews.title: They wont mount directly to Can Am provided mirror mount hole
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a Can Am outlander, they do not fit in the threaded hole that is supplied buy Can Am. They seem nice otherwise, but we haven't been on the train yet.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Schultz

customer_reviews.title: seems to work
customer_reviews.text: put these on my two polaris atv's and work the way they should
customer_reviews.author: cchuckie51

customer_reviews.title: Four Wheeler add on
customer_reviews.text: Fit nice and seem to be sturdy enough for my four wheeler.
customer_reviews.author: schultz

customer_reviews.title: Nice mirrors
customer_reviews.text: I ended up putting the mirror on the atv rack as there was not room on the handle bars on my atv.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Lindvall

customer_reviews.title: Don’t over tighten
customer_reviews.text: Definitely easy to over tighten, broke one very easily. Also doesn’t really fit well on a mini bike but I can see why it would work on an atv
customer_reviews.author: Jed Erickson

customer_reviews.title: Mirrors:
customer_reviews.text: Just what I wanted. Mirrors look great and installed easy. They work very well also.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fit
customer_reviews.text: They fit my Artic Cat 4 wheeler just fine I trailer it and did not have to take them off road just fine
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we wanted
customer_reviews.text: Fit our Polaris well. They were the right height and were exactly what we needed for our ATV.
customer_reviews.author: P. Lyons

customer_reviews.title: Check sizing
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't able to install mirror bracket thread didn't match with mirror thread. Waiting to hear back from distributor.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mirrors for my quad
customer_reviews.text: Works great I have a bad neck so turning around is really difficult. Way better
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great mirror
customer_reviews.text: Great mirrors were exactly as described very easy to install
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Work great
customer_reviews.text: I like how it is easy assembled. Great for 4 wheeler
customer_reviews.author: Eugene Stumpner

customer_reviews.title: Perfect replacement !
customer_reviews.text: These mirrors are perfect for my needs . They arrived in a sturdy package with no damage at all .
customer_reviews.author: cat people

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: They look better in person than in the photo. Very nice, my boyfriend loved them.
customer_reviews.author: K. Barkey

product_meta.title: MZS ATV Mirrors Rear View 7/8 Handlebar Mount Compatible with Arctic Cat Can-am Honda Kymco Kawasaki KTM Suzuki Polaris Yamaha ATV's Motorcycle Scooter Moped Dirt Quad Bike Bicycle Cruiser Snowmobile
product_meta.description:
Specification: 

 *  Condition: 100% Brand New 
 *  Material: ABS Injection Molded Housing, HD Glass and Steel Stem 
 *  Mirror Size: 5.07(L) x 3.07(W) Inch 
 *  Mirror Weight: 0.44 KG 
 *  Mirror Clamps: 0.1 KG 


 Package Includes: 

 *  1 pair of Mirrors (Left & Right) 
 *  1 pair of Clamps 
 *  Instructions Included (Please check the products picture, it will display the Instructions) 


 Features: 

 *  Good weather ability and smooth surface 
 *  Ball-type universal connecting joint, can be 360 degrees rotated 
 *  Convex mirrors design make objects appear smaller and farther away in order to provide the driver with a larger view of what is behind him 
 *  The plastic parts of the mirror stem along with shockproof feature, effectively prevent the mirror's connection joints from easily swinging during driving 
 *  Suitable for any standard 7/8" diameter bars with handlebar adapter 
 *  Its stylish design is perfect to decorate your motorbike
   


 Fitment: 

 *  Most brands of 7/8 inch motorbike, Street Bike, ATV, Dirt Bike, BMX Bicycle and Scooter, such as Kawasaki, Suzuki, Honda, Yamaha, Arctic Cat, Polaris, Can-am, Victory, Cruiser Chopper, etc. 


 Install Notice 

 *  This ATV mirrors must need to used with clamps 
 *  It only can fit 7/8 handlebar or rack 
 *  Please don't over tightening bolt when installing to avoid the mirror clamp damage 
 *  Please confirm if there is enough space for installation on the handlebar or front rack before purchase 
 *  We provides lifetime technical support, if you need some install instructions, or some damaged parts need to replace please contact us.
feature_bullets: NSTALL NOTICE - This ATV mirrors must need to used with clamps, it only can fit 7/8 handlebar. Please confirm if there is enough space for installation on the handlebar or front rack before purchase. We provides lifetime technical support, if you need some install instructions or some damaged parts need to replace please contact us, we will help you.
FITMENT - Motocycle Scooter Moped Dirt Quad Bike Cruiser Coolster Jet ski Snowmobile ATV Arctic Cat Can-am Honda Kymco Kawasaki KTM Suzuki Polaris Yamaha
SECURE AND STABLE - Adopted high impact ABS housing and Plastic, along with shockproof feature, effectively prevent the mirror's connection joints from easily swinging during driving

BASIC FUNCTION - This rearview mirror to increase the driver's awareness and field of vision and to remove blind spots by allowing the driver to see the vehicles and conditions behind him, and it have extremely Bright Long Lasting Turn Signals.
BEST VISION POSTION - Set the Left Mirror to see What is Behind you and Set the Other Mirror for What is in your Rear-Three-Quarters Vision
